headline.main: JAPANESE ADVANCE ON 4 CHINA FRONTS; Gain in Yunnan, Near Burma, and in Kwangtung, Shantung and Hupeh Provinces CHUNGKING FORCES RESIST British Fliers Attack Bases and Communications of Enemy on Wide Range Over Burma

lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, Feb. 28 (AP) -- Japanese advances in Western Yunnan Province were admitted by the Chinese today in a High Command communique that also reported fighting in the Provinces of Kwangtung, Hupeh and Shantung.
abstract: China battles: Jap troops advance northward toward Tachupa, Mitakwan area, and eastward from Kunlong; attack Mengting; retake Suiki, Kwantung, and Fengkow, Hupeh; move from Chiangyu and other bases against Chinese positions, Shantung; attack Chinese strongholds, Ishui and Chaohsien dists
snippet: CHUNGKING, China, Feb. 28 (AP) -- Japanese advances in Western Yunnan Province were admitted by the Chinese today in a High Command communique that also reported fighting in the Provinces of Kwangtung, Hupeh and Shantung....
